content.question: If <math alttext="y prime equals, the fraction with numerator 2 x minus 1, and denominator the square root of 2 times x squared, minus 2 x, plus 3, end root, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="y equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of 2 times x squared, minus 2 x, plus 3, end root, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="5.0ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mrow></math>

<math alttext="2 times the square root of 2 times x squared, minus 2 x, plus 3, end root, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="one half times the square root of 2 times x squared, minus 2 x, plus 3, end root, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the complex fraction with numerator x squared, minus x, and denominator the square root of, the fraction 2 times x cubed, over 3, end fraction, minus x squared, plus 3 x, end root, end complex fraction, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of 2 times x squared, minus 2 x, plus 3, end root, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="5.0ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
